level.text: The Director or his or her designee shall be the custodian of Certificate of Occupancy records. The records shall include, but not be limited to, the following:
Exemptions granted pursuant to section ยง 1404; and
All approved applications for Certificates of Occupancy, issued Certificates of Occupancy and copies of all cancellation notices and related correspondence.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 29 DCR 5571, 5574 (December 17, 1982).
